snippet.title: Creature Battle Lab Teaser www.creaturebattlelab.com
snippet.description:
Enter a world of bizarre science, filled with gene splicing and mixed up elements. Become an intern at the famous 'Creature Battle Lab', experimenting with DNA to create a team of fearsome/cute/weird battling creatures. Unleash them in the lab arena and work your way up the leagues to prove yourself, as the ultimate creature "Pro"-fessor. 

Visit www.creaturebattlelab.com

• Combine hundreds of skills to fight with different play styles. 
• Customise your creatures with near infinite possibilities. 
• Create creatures and bout in the battle arena. 
• free to play on iPhone and iPad. 
• released in autumn 2014.
